Aqconfig - configuration for data acquisition server

The program edits the configuration for an acquisition tool for Siemens Simatic S7 PLCs. It was written in Python with Tkinter as GUI library. To build the GUI a GUI Builder named PAGE was used.

This was my first (finished) Python (3) application with a GUI. I always use my (private) projects to learn something new. Lots of web pages and lots of Stack overflow [https://stackoverflow.com/] entries have been visited to find solutions to my problems. Thanks a lot to the community of coders and developpers.

About

With this program you can edit configuration files for the data aqcuisition program aqserver. Its GUI is written in Python and Tkinter.
